sqlMap.select: SELECT T1.YEAR, T1.MON, T1.METRIC_ID AS METRIC_ID, T2.NEXT_PLAN_NM AS PLAN_NM_1MON, T2.NEXT_PLAN_CONTENTS AS PLAN_CONTENTS_1MON, T1.ACT_NM, T1.ACT_CONTENTS, T1.ACT_NM_Y, T1.NEXT_PLAN_NM, T1.NEXT_PLAN_CONTENTS, T1.PLAN_NM_Y, T1.SELF_EVAL, T1.FINAL_EVAL, T1.EVAL_REASON, T1.STATUS_ID, T1.CREATE_DT, T3.CAUSE_DESC, T3.CATCH_UP, T4.ATTACH_FILE_CNT FROM BSC_INIT_ACTIVITY T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_INIT_ACTIVITY T2 ON T1.YEAR = T2.YEAR AND T2.MON = T1.MON-1 AND T2.METRIC_ID = T1.METRIC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_CAUSE T3 ON T3.YEAR = T1.YEAR AND T3.MON = T1.MON AND T3.METRIC_ID = T1.METRIC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT YEAR, MON, METRIC_ID, COUNT(SEQ) AS ATTACH_FILE_CNT FROM BSC_INITIATIVE_ACT_ATTACH WHERE 1=1 AND YEAR = #findYear# AND METRIC_ID = #findMetricId# GROUP BY YEAR, MON, METRIC_ID )T4 ON T4.YEAR = T1.YEAR AND T4.MON = T1.MON AND T4.METRIC_ID = T1.METRIC_ID WHERE T1.YEAR = #findYear# AND T1.METRIC_ID = #findMetricId# ORDER BY T1.MON DESC

SELECT METRIC_NM , T.STRATEGY_NM AS STRATEGY_NM , U.USER_NM AS KPI_INSERT_USER_ID FROM BSC_METRIC A LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_STRATEGY T ON T.YEAR = A.YEAR AND T.STRATEGY_ID = A.STRATEGY_ID AND T.DELETE_DT IS NULL LEFT OUTER JOIN V_ROLE_USER U ON U.USER_ID = A.INSERT_USER_ID WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear# AND A.METRIC_ID = #findMetricId#

SELECT MON, SEQ, ATTACH_FILE_NM, ATTACH_FILE_FNM, ATTACH_FILE_SUFFIX, ATTACH_FILE_PATH FROM BSC_INITIATIVE_ACT_ATTACH WHERE 1=1 AND YEAR = #findYear# AND METRIC_ID = #findMetricId# ORDER BY MON DESC, SEQ
